name: Wreck it ball!
description:
Wreck it ball!  Destroy all the bricks 

Use the bar to bounce the ball and destroy all the bricks!

 Don't drop the ball

Be careful not to drop the ball or you will lose a life!

Collect the power-ups 

Choose well the power-ups to use to make as many points as you can!

What's your highscore?

Download

Download the zip file to have the GDevelop5 project and see how I made the game.

All image and audio files are made by me, you are free to use them as you prefer. I’ll be happy to see how you use them!😉

If you want to use the font file you can download it here: https://www.dafont.com/04b-19.font
